function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Enforced social isolation stimulating digital economy and online education","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of international solidarity in addressing covid-19 and the sdgs","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fractured state of global health diplomacy","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential reduction in political support for aid and development priorities","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Underinvestment in healthcare systems","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Nationalism and populism fueling disunity","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of global coordination and collaboration","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fueling populism and nationalism via patriotism","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Allocation of relief funds to projects not directly related to the epidemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Long-lasting economic impacts on developing nations","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited food supplies due to poverty and unemployment","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduced access to healthcare due to underinvestment and lack of resilience","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fueling of populism and nationalism","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misuse of health information by big tech and governments","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disproportionate impact on the poor and vulnerable","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of capital outflows and economic damage to low-income countries","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of access to clean water and proper sanitation leading to increased risk of contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay in developing an effective vaccine for covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate access to mobile and smart phones, particularly in lower-and middle-income populations and certain regions","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of access to distance learning due to limited internet and technology in developing countries","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exacerbation of gender inequality due to the impact of the pandemic on women and girls","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Widening of income and wealth inequalities globally due to the pandemic","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption of disease prevention programs due to focus on covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Economic shutdown leading to small business closures and unemployment","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased likelihood of conflicts within and across borders","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Existing disease prevention programs disrupted by focus on covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ill-equipped healthcare systems in developing countries","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Mental health problems overlooked due to social isolation","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pandemics like the coronavirus disease can lead to significant psychological impact, exacerbated by socio-economic inequalities and uncertainty about the future.","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lockdowns prevent people from going to work, leading to prolonged economic impacts and potential worsened living conditions.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overloaded health systems and fear of infection deter people from seeking medical care, leading to potential high mortality rates and strain on health facilities.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Concentration of attention on economic and business concerns","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Threat to sustainable development and un sustainable development goals sdgs","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rise in global poverty due to covid-19 economic shutdown","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid spread of the epidemic through international travel","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unemployment and economic uncertainty due to the pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to perform all work remotely , in travel, agriculture, manufacturing","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 within supply chains","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of widespread transmission in public settings","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependency on the development of a vaccine","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through the analysis and synthesis of a wide range of materials from online sources.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of critical assessment of covid-19 impacts","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of systemic influences on impact","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to address the self-organizing and growth limitations of the global economy","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Highly infectious virus transmitted through droplets from infected individuals.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid global spread of the virus resulting in a pandemic.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High number of confirmed cases and deaths in specific regions.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Origins of the virus in wuhan, an industrialized city in china","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Immediate economic impacts of the virus on international trade, air travel, and employment","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Identification and classification of the novel covid-19 virus","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
